title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 920.1 - Funding
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 920.1 - Funding

State Regulations
(a) Funds to
support statewide projects and demonstration programs under this part shall be
made available through the Department of Labor under the Job Training

Partnership Act (JTPA). (b) Applicant entities may apply for all or any portion of funds available, the use
of which is not limited to a single substate area. (c) Successful applicants will be funded
through a contract process with the department in coordination with the
federally approved New York State Economic Dislocation and Worker Adjustment

Assistance Act (EDWAA) Plan and the affected substate area. (d) Requested funding levels may be adjusted
as appropriate and necessary to accommodate the number and needs of acceptable
proposals submitted. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
920.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
